title: TO_DECIMAL
description: Converts the input value to a Decimal. If the input cannot be converted, the function throws an error.

parameters.name: string/double/long/float/integer
parameters.description: The string to convert into a Decimal

parameters.name: scale_optional
parameters.description: The number of decimal places to round to. If omitted, no rounding occurs.

tips.text: Ensure that the input string is a valid decimal representation.
